summary: Software consultant. Front-end and back-end developement for a financial application, and for e-commerce

Creation of a SDK for resellers, analysis of a new web hosting architecture, integration of third-party tools into the system (PayPal, Blesta), integration of new pages on the website, automation of tasks for marketing, back-end maintenance.
Machine learning for optimization of interactive systems
Web service for monitoring sales for the company 'Les 3 Suisses'
